item.description: Join us for a hike in the Blue Hills.  Click [http://www.mass.gov/dcr/parks/metroboston/blue.htm] for more information on the park. Bring water, snacks & lunch.  I'll be hosting this along with the Boston/Providence Single Parents Group.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet by the entrance to the Trailside Museum

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Blue Hills Hike (Families/Solo Adults)
